article_title: North Korea Blames U.S. for Internet Shutdown
article_text:
Pyongyang’s highest decision-making body blamed the U.S. government for causing an Internet outage across its major websites and for pushing Sony Pictures Entertainment to release a satirical film that portrays the assassination of North Korean leader Kim Jong Un.

The statement on Saturday, released through the North’s state media and attributed to a spokesman for the policy department of the National Defense Commission that Mr. Kim leads, accused the U.S. of having “feigned ignorance” about any role in the disruption of...
